saf.core.ui.dock

Class StateChanger

  • java.lang.Object
    • saf.core.ui.dock.StateChanger

  • public class StateChanger
extends java.lang.Object
    Changes a dockable's state -- minimized, normalized, etc.
    Author:
    Nick Collier

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StateChanger(bibliothek.gui.dock.common.CControl control, DefaultDockingManager dockingManager)
      Creates a StateChanger that uses the specified control to effect the state changes.

        Parameters:
        control - the control to use to change the state
        dockingManager - the dockingManger used by this StateChanger

      • fixFocusPolicy

        public void fixFocusPolicy(DockableFrame frame)
        Fixes the focus policy of any components in the frame's container hierarchy, if necessary. This works around an error arising from Swing's focus policies interacting with the dockable frames library.
        Parameters:
        frame - the frame that may need fixing
